body:
Hello all, 


Could someone spare me five minutes please and answer a question i have? I have an IGES (.igs) file of a model of a car and i want to use it in radiance if possible. Does anyone know if i can and how i can do this? 


Thanks 


Chris


p.s. World Cup starts tonight!! I bet an England-Germany final.
